metadata.title: CVE-2016-5314 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the PixarLogDecode function in tif_pixarlog.c in LibTIFF4.0.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedTIFF image, as demonstrated by overwriting the vgetparent function pointerwith rgb2ycbcr.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
